about.title: About the company
about.desc1: We have been manufacturing sanitary and hygiene base paper since 2018.
about.desc2: In a short period, we became a leader in the local market, ranking among the top 3 paper manufacturers.
about.desc3: Our young and dynamic team strives to keep all our customers satisfied.
about.desc4: Our team consistently works to improve our processes and the quality of our products day by day.
